enterprise.metadata.title: Supabase for Enterprise
enterprise.metadata.description: Leading enterprises use Supabase to build faster, better, and more scalable products.
enterprise.heroSection.title.label: Supabase for Enterprise
enterprise.heroSection.subheader: Leading enterprises use Supabase to build faster, better, and more scalable products. From GitHub to PwC, innovative companies trust Supabase to drive their digital transformation strategy.
enterprise.useCases.label: Build with Supabase
enterprise.useCases.heading: Stay on the forefront
enterprise.useCases.stories.0.heading: Mozilla use Supabase for GenAI and RAG
enterprise.useCases.stories.0.subheading: We store embeddings in a PostgreSQL database, hosted by Supabase, to perform a <highlight>similarity search to identify the most relevant sections within the MDN</highlight>.
enterprise.useCases.stories.1.heading: Epsilon3 use Supabase to build software for NASA
enterprise.useCases.stories.1.subheading: <highlight>Billion dollar missions need to run reliably and securely</highlight>. We use Supabase because they give us an open-source scalable back-end built by database experts that we can self-host.
enterprise.useCases.stories.2.heading: Pebblely use Supabase to scale to millions of users
enterprise.useCases.stories.2.subheading: It streamlined the database, the API, and authentication. <highlight>Everything was up and running in two days</highlight>. It is easy to get started and provides all the solutions we require as we continue to grow.
enterprise.highlights.0.heading: 100x scale
enterprise.highlights.0.subheading: Maergo handled 100x their highest sustained traffic with Supabase.
enterprise.highlights.1.heading: 83% cost reduction
enterprise.highlights.1.subheading: Shotgun reduced costs by 83% by migrating to Supabase.
enterprise.highlights.2.heading: 20% faster dev
enterprise.highlights.2.subheading: Voypost enjoyed a 20% faster development process.
enterprise.highlights.3.heading: GDPR compliance
enterprise.highlights.3.subheading: Markprompt use Supabase to build GDPR-compliant AI chatbots.
enterprise.performance.heading:
Top performance,

at any scale
enterprise.performance.subheading: Supabase ensures optimal database performance at any scale, so you can focus on innovating and growing without worrying about infrastructure limitations—whether you're handling high-traffic applications, complex queries, or massive data volumes.
enterprise.performance.highlights.0.head: Databases managed
enterprise.performance.highlights.1.head: Databases launched daily
enterprise.security.label: Security
enterprise.security.heading: Trusted for medical records, missions to the moon, and everything in between
enterprise.security.subheading: Keep your data secure with SOC 2, HIPAA, and GDPR compliance. Your customers’ data is encrypted at rest and in transit, with built-in tools for monitoring and managing security threats.
enterprise.security.cta.label: Learn more about Security
enterprise.security.features.0.heading: SOC 2 Type II certified
enterprise.security.features.1.heading: HIPAA compliant
enterprise.security.features.2.heading: DDoS Protection
enterprise.security.features.3.heading: Multi-factor Authentication
enterprise.security.features.4.heading: Vulnerability Management
enterprise.security.features.5.heading: Role-based access control
enterprise.security.features.6.heading: Database Audit Logs
enterprise.security.features.7.heading: Security Advisors
enterprise.security.features.8.heading: Encrypted Storage
enterprise.security.features.9.heading: Network restrictions
enterprise.support.label: Support
enterprise.support.heading:
Get expert help,

whenever you need it
enterprise.support.features.0.heading: Global Support, 24/7
enterprise.support.features.0.subheading: Our team has 100% global coverage. No matter where you are, we’re always available to resolve issues and keep your operations running smoothly.
enterprise.support.features.1.heading: Dedicated team of experts
enterprise.support.features.1.subheading: Get direct access to talented engineers. From onboarding to optimizations, our expert team is here to provide personalized, hands-on support whenever you need it.
enterprise.support.features.2.heading: Migration & Success Support
enterprise.support.features.2.subheading: Our team ensures a smooth transition to Supabase while guiding you with best practices for scaling. We’re dedicated to your long-term success, every step of the way.
enterprise.quote.text: Supabase powers prototyping for fast-moving teams such as GitHub Next.
enterprise.quote.author: Idan Gazit
enterprise.quote.role: Senior Director of Research, GitHub Next
enterprise.requestDemo.heading: Request a demo
enterprise.requestDemo.subheading: We can take your requirements and show you how Supabase can help you achieve your goals.
